mapper.select: select * from busi_studentinfo where wx_id = #{wx_id} and enabled=1
select * from busi_studentinfo where fAcctID = #{fAcctID} and enabled=1 limit 1
select * from busi_studentinfo where fAcctID = #{fAcctID} and enabled=1

select stu.* , mainuser.fMobile fMainMobile from busi_studentinfo stu left join acc_main_user mainuser on stu.fAcctID = mainuser.fInnerID where 1=1
and stu.studentname LIKE CONCAT("%",#{studentname},"%")
